biotools.summary: vcf2gwas is a Python-built API for GEMMA, PLINK and bcftools performing GWAS directly from a VCF file as well as multiple post-analysis operations.

bioschemas.name: vcf2gwas
bioschemas.summary: vcf2gwas is a Python-built API for GEMMA, PLINK and bcftools performing GWAS directly from a VCF file as well as multiple post-analysis operations.
